TextBlock.Text: Stelis: The Helicon is a small lizard from the planet Dactyl, in the Col system.
Stelis: It is currently on the list of endangered species, with only a few hundred individuals.
Stelis: The main peril they face is a harsh climate due to the planet being titally locked.
Stelis: The introduction of the bipedal red-tailed horned bukrad has put further pressure on the dwindling population.
